thread.title: James Cruse
thread.title_full: Premium Mortgage reviewed by James Cruse

author: James Cruse
title: James Cruse
text: When we started out Tim Collins was very helpful, but after a few weeks, Tim would not return our phone calls or emails. I find that very unprofessional. Luck for us Theresa Pera was very helpful and if not for her we may not have gotten our mortgage. If I had to do over, I would not have worked with Tim Collins in your company.
